pages.text: $(o)As this is a Research venture, there is a lot of items and things to research and take note of. To that, I have included a Research Journal with your deployment kit.$(br2)$(l)$(#ff0000)WORK IN PROGRESS!

pages.title: For Research!
pages.text: $(o)This is not like the Q.U.E.S.T. Tablet given out during previous Ferret Business research ventures (whether planned or unplanned...) $(br2)Instead, this Research Journal will accept the items listed, increasing your Research Progress.

$(o)Items submitted to the Research Journal are CONSUMED, keep in mind! The 'Team/Party' function has been disabled, as we need ALL the research data we can get.$(br2)This means each member of your team will be allowed to submit research items, and obtain rewards as well.
